channel.title: Can someone help me with my Configs?
channel.description:
I have downloaded the Testscape Source server.
Can someone help me with making: -Portals -NPC`s and talking -Pest control (And that kind off stuff) -Beginnner costum
Plz make some tuts under this message
AND WHAT MEANS JAVAC?
When i compiled it it stand in dutch: " Javac word niet herkend als bestands" or somthing like that?
Regards,
P K N 3 W B

item.title: Can someone help me with my Configs?
item.dc:creator: @P_k_n_3_w_b P k n 3 w b
item.description:
@P_k_n_3_w_b wrote:

Yes thanks,

But now my biggest problem is.

I`ve replaced lumbridge guide to Varrock east bank, but how can i let him talk like:

Welcome to Bremscape!

â€¦

Type ::commands for Commands

Or somthing like that

My second biggest problem is

making portals

Who knows it

Regards,

P k n 3 w b

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with my Configs?

item.title: Can someone help me with my Configs?
item.dc:creator: @scillman scillman
item.description:
@scillman wrote:

Javac is simply to fix COPY your files in your java/bin folder.
Compile!
And copy the .CLASS files back to your folder!
(or if you cut/past then cut/past it by the two)

Hope this helps you.

Read full topic
